scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run cordova -- prepare && copyfiles -u 1 "mobile/xwalk-command-line" "mobile/platforms/android/assets/"
scripts.build: rimraf public && brunch build --production && copyfiles -u 1 "public/**/*.*" "desktop/www" && copyfiles -u 1 "public/**/*.*" "mobile/www"
scripts.desktop: npm run build && npm run nwb -- -v v0.28.1 -r ./desktop/
scripts.desktop:release-win: npm run build && npm run nwb -- -v v0.28.1 -p win64 ./desktop/ -o ./build/
scripts.desktop:release-mac: npm run build && npm run nwb -- -v v0.28.1 -p osx64 ./desktop/ -o ./build/
scripts.android: npm run build && npm run cordova run android
scripts.android:debug: npm run build && npm run cordova -- build android --debug
scripts.android:release: npm run build && npm run cordova -- build android --release
